title: E0271 displays wrong span for "required by this bound"

labels.name: A-diagnostics
labels.description: Area: Messages for errors, warnings, and lints

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
When compiling https://github.com/paritytech/polkadot/pull/1795/commits/828048247c644476c0b1e4acdaaf641f09cd49a3 with `cargo check -p polkadot-service`, I (correctly) receive several error messages, one of which is this E0271:

```
error[E0271]: type mismatch resolving `<OverseerSubsystemContext<Box<(dyn polkadot_node_subsystem::messages::ChainApiMessageTrait + 'static)>> as SubsystemContext>::Message == polkadot_node_subsystem::messages::ChainApiMessage<_, _, H256>`
    --> node/service/src/lib.rs:367:2
     |
367  |     Overseer::new(
     |     ^^^^^^^^^^^^^ expected struct `Box`, found enum `polkadot_node_subsystem::messages::ChainApiMessage`
     | 
    ::: /home/coriolinus/Documents/Projects/paritytech/polkadot/node/overseer/src/lib.rs:1057:13
     |
1057 |         CG: Subsystem<OverseerSubsystemContext<CollationGenerationMessage>> + Send,
     |             --------------------------------------------------------------- required by this bound in `Overseer::<S>::new`
     |
     = note: expected type `Box<(dyn polkadot_node_subsystem::messages::ChainApiMessageTrait + 'static)>`
                found enum `polkadot_node_subsystem::messages::ChainApiMessage<_, _, H256>`
     = note: required because of the requirements on the impl of `polkadot_overseer::Subsystem<OverseerSubsystemContext<Box<(dyn polkadot_node_subsystem::messages::ChainApiMessageTrait + 'static)>>>` for `ChainApiSubsystem<_, Arc<RuntimeClient>>`
```

Note that the bound reports a span at line 1057, referring to a `CollationGenerationMessage`. That line is irrelevant to the error. It should be displaying a span at line 1056, referring to a `ChainApiMessage`:

[snippet](https://github.com/paritytech/polkadot/blob/828048247c644476c0b1e4acdaaf641f09cd49a3/node/overseer/src/lib.rs#L1056-L1057):

```rust
CA: Subsystem<OverseerSubsystemContext<Box<dyn ChainApiMessageTrait>>> + Send, //1056
CG: Subsystem<OverseerSubsystemContext<CollationGenerationMessage>> + Send,    //1057
```

### Meta

`rustc --version --verbose`:
```
rustc 1.49.0-nightly (beb5ae474 2020-10-04)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: beb5ae474d2835962ebdf7416bd1c9ad864fe101
commit-date: 2020-10-04
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.49.0-nightly
LLVM version: 11.0
```
